dublin_core.dcvalue: Chondrodermatitis nodularis helicis CNH is an idiopathic inflammatory painful condition of the ear characterized by a tender nodule located on the helix or antihelix Even if various causes have been ascribed such as a microvascular injury due to acute exposure to cold or trauma pressure or rubbing etiopathogenesis still remains unknown We describe the unusual case of a young female with a peculiar sequential onset of bilateral CNH in the antihelix region possibly ascribed to the direct use of mobile phone without earphones
Made available in DSpace on 2020-06-08T14:31:51Z (GMT). No. of bitstreams: 0 Previous issue date: 2-11-30
The Direct Use of Mobile Phone and the Occurrence of Chondrodermatitis Nodularis in the Antihelix: An Exemplificative Case.
